title: Washington Post: Investigation finds Israeli-designed spyware was used to hack journalists and activists around the world
content:
1. Washington Post: Investigation finds Israeli-designed spyware was used to hack journalists and activists around the world  CNN
  2. Private spy software sold by NSO Group found on cellphones worldwide  The Washington Post
  3. Spyware used to target journalists and activists around the world, reports indicate  POLITICO
  4. OCCRP: Israeli-made spyware used to monitor journalists and activists worldwide | KyivPost - Ukraine's Global Voice  Kyiv Post
  5. FT editor among 180 journalists identified by clients of spyware firm  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ワシントンポスト イスラエルが設計したスパイウェアが世界中のジャーナリストや活動家のハッキングに使われていたことが調査で判明
华盛顿邮报》。调查发现以色列设计的间谍软件被用来入侵世界各地的记者和活动家
華盛頓郵報》。調查發現以色列設計的間諜軟件被用來入侵世界各地的記者和活動家
